links.title: Trump and Xi expected to announce truce in the trade war
links.description: President Trump and his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, are likely to announce a freeze in their growing hostilities on trade, although the truce will leave billions of dollars in existing tariffs in place and a longer-term solution contingent on key details being sorted out by their aides.
